data: {"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"今回はプログラミングをするうえで必要になる ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"orange"},"plain_text":"変数 ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"について学んでいきます。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"変数という言葉、数学などでは頻繁に聞くかもしれませんが、プログラミングでの変数は数学などでの変数とは少し違います。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プログラミングでの変数とは、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"データを入れる箱 ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"と言えます。以下のプログラムを見てください。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"これは、「a」という名前の箱（","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"変数","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"）に10という数字を入れ、「b」という名前の箱（","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"変数","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"）に5という数字を入れているプログラムです。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"この箱に数字などのデータを入れることをプログラミングでは","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"代入","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"といいます。「a=10とする」を「aに10を代入する」と言うことがよくあります。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"Pythonではこの代入を ","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"＝（イコール）","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"を使って表します。数学では ＝ は二つの式や値が等しいときに使う記号ですが、","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":true,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"プログラミングでは少し違うので注意しましょう。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"前章のprint関数を使えば、この変数を画面上に出力することができます。先程のプログラムにprint関数を次のように書き足すと","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"このように変数","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"a","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"の中に入っている","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"10","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"が出力されました。","href":null}]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"カンマで区切ることで、複数の変数を一行の","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":true,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"print関数","href":null},{"annotations":{"bold":false,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"で出力したり、テキストといっしょに出力することもできます。","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["a = 10
b = 5
print(a, b)
print("変数aの値は", a, "です")
print("変数bの値は", b, "です")"],"caption":[]}
